entry.title: Token Fleet Smart Contract Audit Report
entry.content:
Hello Token Fleet community!

We‚Äôre excited to share that Token Fleet‚Äôs smart contracts have been successfully audited by the renowned Nethermind Security team.

Security is the foundation of everything we build. Before bringing Token Fleet to life, we made sure our code was tested, reviewed, and verified by experts.

üöó Why Smart Contract Audits Matter‚Äã

At Token Fleet, smart contracts handle:

  • Fractional car ownership
  • Rental income tracking
  • User rewards and income distribution
  • Secure, transparent asset management

This is why we invested in a full security review of our system. It‚Äôs not just about trust, it‚Äôs about ensuring that every user interaction is protected by solid code.

üîç Audit Highlights‚Äã

  • 769 lines of Solidity code reviewed
  • 67/67 tests passed, zero failed
  • No critical vulnerabilities
  • 1 High issue: Fixed
  • 2 Medium issues: 1 Fixed, 1 Acknowledged
  • 2 Low issues: Acknowledged

üî• Fixed Issues‚Äã

  1. Fundraising Target Logic
    Corrected to ensure that all contributions are tracked accurately.

  2. Reward Claiming Accuracy
    Now ensures users always receive full rewards, without loss from rounding errors.

‚ö†Ô∏è Acknowledged Issues‚Äã

  1. Referral Rewards
    Referral rewards could lock if a user has no referrer. Our system enforces referrers on signup to avoid this.

  2. Deal Deadlines
    Deals can close after a deadline if users don‚Äôt cancel. Deadlines serve as user protection, not a strict blocker.

  3. Portfolio Approval Flexibility
    Token approvals can currently be handled through a low-level function. This is functional and may be improved later.

üìÑ Full Audit Report‚Äã

For those who like details, the full audit report is available here:
üëâ tokenfleet.io/audit

üõ†Ô∏è What This Means for You‚Äã

This audit proves that:

  • Security is not an afterthought
  • Ownership and rental income are protected
  • Smart contracts are reliable and transparent

We‚Äôre building a platform where real cars meet real returns. You can trust the technology behind your investments.

üöÄ What‚Äôs Next?‚Äã

We‚Äôre almost ready to launch. Token Fleet will soon open up a new era of decentralized car ownership and income.

Own cars. Earn yield. Trust the code.

Stay tuned, and thank you for being part of our journey!

  • Twitter: @tokenfleet_io
  • Telegram: @tokenfleet_io
  • LinkedIn: Token Fleet
  • Facebook: Token Fleet Official

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Welcome to the Token Fleet Blog!
entry.content:
Welcome to the Token Fleet Blog!

Hello and welcome to the official Token Fleet blog!

We‚Äôre thrilled to have you here as we embark on this exciting journey together. Token Fleet is more than just a platform; it‚Äôs a community of innovative investors and car enthusiasts who believe in the power of technology and shared opportunities.

Who We Are

At Token Fleet, we are revolutionizing the way people invest in the automotive industry. By tokenizing car ownership, we provide accessible investment opportunities in a diverse fleet of vehicles‚Äîfrom luxury cars to everyday favorites‚Äîthat show promising profitability.

What You Can Expect from Our Blog

Our blog is your go-to resource for all things related to Token Fleet and the world of car investment. Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:

‚Ä¢ Industry Insights: Stay updated with the latest trends in the automotive and investment sectors. ‚Ä¢ Platform Updates: Be the first to know about new features, services, and enhancements on the Token Fleet platform. ‚Ä¢ Educational Content: Learn about tokenization, blockchain technology, and how to maximize your investment with us. ‚Ä¢ Community Stories: Read success stories and experiences from our community members. ‚Ä¢ Upcoming Events: Get information on webinars, workshops, and events where you can connect with us and other investors.

Join the Conversation

We believe in building a community where everyone can share ideas, ask questions, and grow together. We encourage you to engage with our content, leave comments, and share posts that you find interesting.

Stay Connected

Don‚Äôt miss out on any updates! Subscribe to our newsletter and follow us on social media:

‚Ä¢ Twitter: @tokenfleet_io ‚Ä¢ LinkedIn: Token Fleet ‚Ä¢ Facebook: Token Fleet Official

Thank You
